item.description:
HOTFIX 1 - September 23, 2025 - 2.4.0 BUG FIXES Fixed an issue where Legendary items were dropping more frequently than intended at lower levels, and far less often in higher difficulties.

By filthierich on 2025/09/23 at 7:20 PM A title https://www.wowhead.com/diablo-4/blue-tracker/topic/us/231178 https://www.wowhead.com/diablo-4/blue-tracker/topic/us/231178 Tue, 23 Sep 2025 19:20:43 -0500
